alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 6:39PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is in effect... * A trough over the Islands and a strong high pressure system southwest will create tight pressure gradients and strong winds over the territory, especially in the harbor area and in higher elevations... * TIMING...through Friday * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. Downed shallow-root trees and phone lines are possible. Shifting of loose and unsecured objects are also possible. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 640 AFIAFI ASO LULU FEPUARI 16 2022 ...FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O uiga louloua o le tau i luga o le atunu`u ma peau mamafa o le ea i saute i sisifo o le a faatupulaia ai savili malolosi e oo atu i le Aso Faraile... * TAIMI...E oo atu i le Aso Faraile * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E pau`u laau, lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e oo atu i le 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o le a aafia ai le atunuu. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
